official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of May 20 through May 26, 1979, as "National Oceans Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating May 20 through May 26, 1979 as "National Oceans Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of May 20 through May 26, 1979, as "National Oceans Week".
